TitleEnglish: Hero Without a Class: Who Even Needs Skills?!
SummaryEnglish: “Classes” are given at the age of 10, and the presence or absence of “skills” greatly affect life. Arel, the son of “Sword Princess” Fara and “Magic King” Leon, has been branded as “Classless”… But even without a job or skills, Arel believes he can persevere through effort.
Aliases: Mushoku no Eiyū: Betsu ni Skill Nanka Iranakattan da ga
Mushoku no Eiyuu: Betsu ni Skill Nanka Iranakattan da ga
Mushoku no Eiyuu: Betsu ni Skill Nanka Iranakattan daga
無職の英雄　別にスキルなんか要らなかったんだが　-才能ゼロの成り上がり-
The Classless Hero: I Didn't Need Skills Anyway
The Hero Who Has No Class. I Don't Need Any Skills, It's Okay.
The Unemployed Hero Does Not Need Something Like Skills
Hero Without a Class: Who Even Needs Skills?!
The Hero Who Has No Class
The Hero Who Has No Class: I Don't Need Any Skills, It's Okay

1.SummaryEnglish: Arel is classless, but that doesn’t make him helpless. Not when he understands he can still learn what others were simply given.

2.SummaryEnglish: Arel searches for a guild but being classless closes more doors than it opens. Fortunately (or unfortunately), Lilia wants to recruit him for hers.

3.SummaryEnglish: Now that Dragon Fang has three members, they can enter the competition and win the prize money to keep them going. That is, if they beat Black Blade, the current top guild.

4.SummaryEnglish: Arel, Lilia, and Reiner head to the dungeon underneath the city for training. Little do they know, however, that Georg is plotting against them.
